item.description:
Hello everyone, I'm back! It's been a while...

 

Please join me at the MFA after work on Friday 20th (Sorry but I had to change the date to 20th)!  This is the late Friday evening 5.30 - 9.30 pm at the MFA - in the summer it's every weekend in the Calderwood Courtyard with live music and a cash bar. Receita de Samba (Brasilian ensemble) will be ...let your hair down at the end of a hot work week...take in some art....have a glass of wine etc. Meet some old and new friends!

Free with MFA admission ($25!!) You might be able to get a less expensive ticket at your local library.

By the way, I also ask people to pay me $1 on arrival to help cover Meetup fees - thank you.

http://www.mfa.org/programs/special-event/mfa-summer-fridays
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the foyer near the store, look for Ange and Meetup sign
item.name: Summer Friday at the MFA - Note NEW DATE!
